title: MD
biography: Dr. M. K. Rajakumar was a Malaysian doctor and socialist politician. As a doctor, he was a pioneer of the discipline of Family Medicine by general practitioners in Malaysia. As a leftist intellectual he was among the leaders of the Labour Party of Malaya and Barisan Sosialis in the 1960s, helping to build the Labour Party alongside Tan Chee Khoon, V. David and Ishak Haji Muhammad.
aiSummary: Jeyaindran Sinnadurai is a oncology specialist with an H-index of 7 at Subang Jaya Medical Centre (Member). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
